title: NCLAT lifts lien on IL&FS Transportation
description: NCLAT orders lifting of lien on ITNL's account, deeming Maharashtra tax department's attachment contrary to previous decision. PNB seeks interim distribution of Rs 12 crore from ITNL's account towards debt, allowing IL&FS board to consider fund distribution.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
